options.name: delete
options.description: How much of their recent message history to delete

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the ban; the user will be notified in DM

options.name: message
options.description: A custom goodbye message to be sent in DMs independent from the ban reason

options.name: temp
options.description: Ban a user for a specific amount of time

options.name: format
options.description: For how long or until which date to ban the user
